events.message: Client submitted the mortgage loan application for purchasing a new house in the suburb area.
Application was reviewed and categorised under Mortgage Loan due to property purchase intent.
A dedicated loan officer was assigned to manage the mortgage loan application efficiently.
Initial review of the application confirms all mandatory forms and details have been submitted.
Additional financial documents and property valuation report were requested to proceed further.
Client has submitted all requested financial documents and the updated property appraisal report.
Credit check completed with a good credit score which supports the approval of the loan.
Risk assessment was performed and highlights a manageable risk level for the proposed mortgage.
Loan offer was presented to the applicant including interest rate options and repayment schedule.
Applicant provided positive feedback and accepted the terms outlined in the mortgage loan offer.
Mortgage loan application has been approved following review of all submitted documentation.
Approved mortgage amount was successfully disbursed to the property sellerâ€™s account.
Follow-up with the client was performed to ensure all disbursement related questions are answered.
The mortgage loan application file was closed after successful funding and client confirmation.
